item.title: Next Steps
item.description: After reading through this chapter, you are ready to start learning more on types! Here are some additional resources on scope in case you are interested. Scope and Closures in JavaScript W3Schools JavaScript Scope GeeksforGeeks - What is Variable Scope in JavaScript
